channel.title: ThibaultBlivet on PrestaShop Developers' blog
channel.description: Recent content in ThibaultBlivet on PrestaShop Developers' blog

item.title: Hummingbird v2.0.0 Beta Is Available
item.description: We are thrilled to announce the release of Hummingbird v2.0.0 Beta. This milestone is the result of a monumental effort, representing more than 320 commits, 500 file changes, 50,000 additions, and 30,000 deletions. The goal is to deliver a developer-first, lightweight, and modular theme that establishes a new standard for the PrestaShop ecosystem.

item.title: PrestaShop Back Office rebranding with PrestaShop 9
item.description: By the end of 2023, PrestaShop unveiled a new brand identity to strengthen its position, enhance credibility, and build trust. We already announced the new branding for the project, and the PrestaShop back office is one of the last assets to follow this change. The release of PrestaShop 9 provided the perfect opportunity for this update. The rebranding involved significant changes to the PrestaShop back office, focusing on its two themes.
